2016 Johnny Appleseed Children's Theatre auditions

Auditions for the JACT 2016 season are scheduled for Saturday, May 7, 2016.

 2016 JACT auditions will be held again at Apple Hill Playhouse , 275 Manor Road, Delmont, 15626.
ShowRun datesCastDirector
OH JACK! June 14, 16, 18, 21, 23, 24 Jack - who loves his mother and his cow
Mother – who loves Jack and is terrified of her Landlord
Vernon Q. Bile – The nefarious, evil landlord
Wallace, the Giant – Big, but loveable
Gurda, the Giant’s Wife – Unhappy in love
Bathsheba – Jack’s pet cow
Chorus 		Tobi Sasso (Music Director: Joette Salandro)
ENCHANTED SLEEPING BEAUTY July 5, 7. 9; 12, 14, 15 Evilina – one BADD witch
Princess Briar-Rose – a lovely young woman
Prince Alexander – gorgeous, and has the ability to hop like a frog
Queen Eleanor –Briar-Rose’s mum
King Rudolph – Briar-Rose’s dad
Prime Minster – the family advisor
Spider – Evelina’s servant
Blue Witch – one GOOD witch
Additional Witches: Green, Red, Orange, Pink, White
Baroness – lady of the court
Lady Jessica – lady of the court
Quill- the Queen Eleanor’s secretary
Chef- A very emotional cook
Black Cat- Evelina’s pet- cynical
Nursemaid – to infant Briar-Rose
Seamstress – her life is her needle and thread
Queen Samantha – of another kingdom
Baron – A soldier of the King
Minstrel- a singer
Wall of Thorns – palace barrier
False Princess – to trap the prince
Dark Knight –fierce warrior who fights with Prince Alexander. Physical role
 Joette Salandro
LOOKING GLASS LAND July 26, 28, 30; AUGUST 2, 4, 5 Alice – young girl who chased a rabbit down the hole
Red King – soporific monarch
White King – defender of the crown
Red Queen – vicious, nasty tempered
White Queen – befuddled but beneficent
There are many, many smaller roles in this show, most of which will distributed among another 10 actors. Performers really need to be versatile and willing to take on a fun filled challenge. 		Becky Shirey

Please fill out the form below to request an audition slot.

In addition, you can print and fill out the audition request form and bring it with you to auditions. 2016_AUDITION_APP_JACT_SHOWS.pdf
